name: Alpine Flowers of the Pacific Northwest
categories: Alpine Flowers of the Pacific Northwest
description: Identify a broad range of alpine flowers with this portable, colourful, 8-fold guide. Coastal Flowers of the Pacific Northwest features 112 images of flowers found from the mid to alpine elevations on Vancouver Island and in the Coast Mountains. Includes a description of plant height, flower size, and each species' distribution range.2-sided.Colour-coded.Ruler printed on the back cover.Includes English and Latin names.Dimensions 23 x 12cm.
